scripts.db:create-role: psql -U postgres -c "CREATE ROLE okanban WITH LOGIN PASSWORD 'okanban'" || echo 'Role already exists'
scripts.db:create-db: psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE okanban OWNER okanban"
scripts.db:create: npm run db:create-role && npm run db:create-db
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:create && npm run db:tables && npm run db:seed
